org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io

类 BarrierTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io.BarrierTracker
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CheckpointBarrierHandler

    @Internal
public class BarrierTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements CheckpointBarrierHandler
    The BarrierTracker keeps track of what checkpoint barriers have been received from which input channels. Once it has observed all checkpoint barriers for a checkpoint ID, it notifies its listener of a completed checkpoint.

    Unlike the BarrierBuffer, the BarrierTracker does not block the input channels that have sent barriers, so it cannot be used to gain "exactly-once" processing guarantees. It can, however, be used to gain "at least once" processing guarantees.

    NOTE: This implementation strictly assumes that newer checkpoints have higher checkpoint IDs.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  BarrierTracker.CheckpointBarrierCount
      Simple class for a checkpoint ID with a barrier counter.

      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private InputGate inputGate
      The input gate, to draw the buffers and events from.
      private long latestPendingCheckpointID
      The highest checkpoint ID encountered so far.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private static int MAX_CHECKPOINTS_TO_TRACK
      The tracker tracks a maximum number of checkpoints, for which some, but not all barriers have yet arrived.
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<BarrierTracker.CheckpointBarrierCount> pendingCheckpoints
      All checkpoints for which some (but not all) barriers have been received, and that are not yet known to be subsumed by newer checkpoints.
      private StatefulTask toNotifyOnCheckpoint
      The listener to be notified on complete checkpoints.
      private int totalNumberOfInputChannels
      The number of channels.

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • MAX_CHECKPOINTS_TO_TRACK

        private static final int MAX_CHECKPOINTS_TO_TRACK
        The tracker tracks a maximum number of checkpoints, for which some, but not all barriers have yet arrived.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • inputGate

        private final InputGate inputGate
        The input gate, to draw the buffers and events from.

      • totalNumberOfInputChannels

        private final int totalNumberOfInputChannels
        The number of channels. Once that many barriers have been received for a checkpoint, the checkpoint is considered complete.

      • pendingCheckpoints

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<BarrierTracker.CheckpointBarrierCount> pendingCheckpoints
        All checkpoints for which some (but not all) barriers have been received, and that are not yet known to be subsumed by newer checkpoints.

      • toNotifyOnCheckpoint

        private StatefulTask toNotifyOnCheckpoint
        The listener to be notified on complete checkpoints.

      • latestPendingCheckpointID

        private long latestPendingCheckpointID
        The highest checkpoint ID encountered so far.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNextNonBlocked

        public BufferOrEvent getNextNonBlocked()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Returns the next BufferOrEvent that the operator may consume. This call blocks until the next BufferOrEvent is available, or until the stream has been determined to be finished.
        指定者:
        getNextNonBlocked 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        The next BufferOrEvent, or null, if the stream is finished.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the network or local disk I/O fails.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread is interrupted while blocking during waiting for the next BufferOrEvent to become available.
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown in case that a checkpoint fails that is started as the result of receiving the last checkpoint barrier

      • registerCheckpointEventHandler

        public void registerCheckpointEventHandler(StatefulTask toNotifyOnCheckpoint)
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Registers the task be notified once all checkpoint barriers have been received for a checkpoint.
        指定者:
        registerCheckpointEventHandler 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        参数:
        toNotifyOnCheckpoint - The task to notify

        public boolean isEmpty()
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Checks if the barrier handler has buffered any data internally.
        指定者:
        isEmpty 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        True, if no data is buffered internally, false otherwise.

      • getAlignmentDurationNanos

        public long getAlignmentDurationNanos()
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Gets the time that the latest alignment took, in nanoseconds. If there is currently an alignment in progress, it will return the time spent in the current alignment so far.
        指定者:
        getAlignmentDurationNanos 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        The duration in nanoseconds
